page.title: 18SHEEP DOG TRAINING
page.content: Although this is often done as a leisure activity,it is of great importance to the sheep & cattle farmer.Generally the farmer trains his own dogs but occasionally,if there is someone in the neighbourhood who is particularly good at it,he might leave the early "running" of the dog to him. It is very important that the pup is out of good working parents.Training starts with general obedience,& only when this is mastered is the pup taken to the sheep.There are four basic commands_LEFT,RIGHT,WALK ON & STOP! The well trained sheep dog is an invaluable asset to the farmer who would feel lost without him.
